npc_output: Not much, just feeling a bit tired from the festival preparations. |r1|
Actually, I could use some assistance with seasoning the spicy meal at noon. Care to lend a hand?
Yes, all secure here. Although I could use some company on my patrol of the secure shield in the city. |r3|
You could say that! I have to report the punctual scroll before sunset. Wish me luck! |r1|
Indeed! I'm working on embroidering the elegant hat in the shop. It's going to be a masterpiece! |r1|
Not yet, but I'm hoping to soon. I've set up a sharp-eyed trap in the forest. |r1|
Just mixing up some fresh herbs in the woods. Care to take a look? |r2|
Always! Though I'm feeling a bit bored at the moment. Nothing a good book can't cure.
Indeed it is! I need to donate the influential debt after the ceremony. |r1|
Actually, I'm composing a new piece. Perhaps I'll play the charming story during festival. |r5|
